fa_settings_change_after_restart: ^ This setting will be changed after restart of the client ^
fa_show_seconds_message_desc: Displays seconds in message timestamps for more precise timing
fa_show_start_token_desc: Shows the start parameter token when opening a bot
fa_show_peer_ids_desc: Display IDs for users, groups, and channels in their profiles
fa_show_dc_ids: Show DC IDs in label of peer ids
fa_show_dc_ids_desc: Adds datacenter information next to peer IDs in profiles
fa_id_in_botapi_type_desc: Shows IDs in Bot API format instead of internal Telegram format
fa_show_registration_date_desc: Displays the account registration date in user profiles
fa_hide_phone_number_desc: Hides phone numbers in settings and all profiles
fa_screenshot_mode_desc: Sensitive information like names and avatars are randomized with texts and numerics for privacy when taking screenshots
fa_local_tg_premium_desc: Enables some premium visual features locally without actual subscription
fa_recent_stickers_desc: Controls the maximum number of recent stickers shown in the sticker panel
fa_disable_custom_chat_background: β Hide custom background of chat
fa_disable_custom_chat_background_desc: Ignores custom chat backgrounds set by other users or channels
fa_hide_open_webapp_button_chatlist_desc: Hides the webapp launch button in the chat list for bots
fa_hide_all_chats_folder_desc: Removes the 'All Chats' folder tab from the folder list
fa_show_discuss_button_desc: Adds a button to quickly jump to the linked discussion group in channels
fa_rounding_desc: Adjusts the corner roundness of avatars
fa_use_default_rounding_desc: Resets avatar corner rounding to Telegram's default values
fa_force_snow_desc: Enables the winter snow animation effect regardless of the current season
fa_logs_dir: You can find the logs in the DebugLogs folder which is located next to FAgram
fa_setting_need_restart: FAgram will restart in order to change this setting
fa_hide_blocked_user_messages_desc: Messages from blocked users will be hidden with spoilers and media won't auto-download.
